name: Pixel Dash (CmSpeedrunner)
description:
Pixel Dash is a simple but fun fast paced runner where you can casually playthrough this small game or speedrun it, it works for everyone! Get to the finish as fast as possible or just take it at your own pace, the game even employs a shmup style of play later on in the game, you dont wanna miss it. (AVALIBLE FOR ALL SYSTEMS MAC, WINDOWS AND LINUX)

*Disclaimer, the game is in version 0.05 so expect bugs and glitches.
